item.title: Compact metal wallet with keyholder
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description:
This is a compact metal wallet. Use it for two years. Very handy. Keys are not rattling around. It can store several cards, cash, and air tag. I like this form factor.

Alternatives include Ridge Wallet, Ekster, Secrid, and Vaultskin wallets, which also offer slim designs and strong materials.

You definitely need to try one of these wallets:
